typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empData
empData split(equals(Deptid, '100'),
	equals(Deptid, '200'),
	equals(Deptid, '300'),
	disjoint: false) ~> DeptPhysics@(Physics, Maths, DS, others)
DeptPhysics@Physics sink(input(
		{emp_name$$|$month$|incentive$$} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Physics.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkphys
DeptPhysics@Maths sink(input(
		{emp_name$$|$month$|incentive$$} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['maths.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> mathssink
DeptPhysics@DS sink(input(
		{emp_name$$|$month$|incentive$$} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DS.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDs
DeptPhysics@others sink(input(
		{emp_name$$|$month$|incentive$$} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['others.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkOthers
